com.j2bugzilla.rpc

Class UpdateBug

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.j2bugzilla.rpc.UpdateBug
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BugzillaMethod

    public class UpdateBug
extends Object
implements BugzillaMethod
    The UpdateBug class allows clients to update an existing Bug on the installation with new values. Currently, this method only allows one bug at a time to be updated. Note that Bugzilla 3.6 does not allow updating bugs via the webservice.
    Author:
    Tom

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpdateBug(Bug bug)
      Creates a new UpdateBug object to submit to the Bugzilla webservice.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMethodName()
      Allows the BugzillaConnector to access this BugzillaMethod's name to pass in the XML-RPC request along with the parameters
      Map<Object,Object> getParameterMap()
      Allows the BugzillaConnector to access this BugzillaMethod's parameters in a form that can be passed to the Bugzilla webservice over XML-RPC.
      void setResultMap(Map<Object,Object> hash)
      Allows the BugzillaConnector to set the returned Map for this BugzillaMethod so that its implementation can provide access to any returned data from the webservice

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateBug

        public UpdateBug(Bug bug)
        Creates a new UpdateBug object to submit to the Bugzilla webservice. The Bug on the installation identified by the id or alias of the bug provided will have its fields updated to match those of the values in the provided bug.
        Parameters:
        bug - a bug object where the field shall be updated

    • Method Detail

      • setResultMap

        public void setResultMap(Map<Object,Object> hash)
        Allows the BugzillaConnector to set the returned Map for this BugzillaMethod so that its implementation can provide access to any returned data from the webservice
        Specified by:
        setResultMap in interface BugzillaMethod
        Parameters:
        hash - A Map of other Objects as returned by the Bugzilla webservice from the request, whether it succeeds or returns a fault. This Map is considered immutable and cannot be written to, only read from.

      • getParameterMap

        public Map<Object,Object> getParameterMap()
        Allows the BugzillaConnector to access this BugzillaMethod's parameters in a form that can be passed to the Bugzilla webservice over XML-RPC.
        Specified by:
        getParameterMap in interface BugzillaMethod
        Returns:
        A Map of Objects required as parameters for the Bugzilla webservice method. This Map is considered immutable and cannot be written to, only read from.

      • getMethodName

        public String getMethodName()
        Allows the BugzillaConnector to access this BugzillaMethod's name to pass in the XML-RPC request along with the parameters
        Specified by:
        getMethodName in interface BugzillaMethod
        Returns:
        A String representing the appropriate webservice method to call on the Bugzilla installation
